name: Mr. Dice Guy
description:
In a world where everyone set their problems by rolling a dice, what would happen if someone steal them? Play as Mr. Dice Guy in this dicey infinite runner and get all the goods Dice City has to offer! May the dice be with you

Controls

ESPACE - jumps/force fall while on air

TAB - pauses the game

Known Issues
  • Not having the color to pass through the platform
Credits

Dino - Coding and Animation

Diogo - Pixel Art and UI

Mareoceu - Music and Sound Effects

Check the game soundtrack on Soundcloud!
